podcast_details.episode_title: Bert Kreischer: A Joke About His Name
podcast_details.episode_transcript: My name's Bert. I know you're thinking hot, sexy name. Do you do porn? I don't. Bert's the last name you want to hear during sex. Some chick on top of you in the dark just, oh, oh, oh. Burt? Oh. Catch Bert Kreischer in The Improv, 60 and Still Standing, only on Netflix.
